title: Your website
text:
As mentionned here quarto works well with github pages.

Create a repository
Clone it
Add a minimal quarto website (_quarto.yml and index.qmd)
Add public/* to the .gitignore
Commit the changes
run quarto publish gh-pages
Add the .github/workflows/publish.yml file
On your gh repository you can change the default branch to the main one

Et voilà, you’re ready to go, every new commit will automatically be published on you website !
